arts.ttl: Alonso talks Vinicius, Mbappe, Bellingham, Valverde after Real Madrid 3-1 Villarreal
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso’s Real Madrid were on point against one of La Liga’s most in-form teams in Villarreal last night and they put three goals past them to register an emphatic win. The spotlight was on Los Blancos after their defeat to Atletico Madrid last weekend and they did not disappoint as they produced a reaction […] The post Alonso talks Vinicius, Mbappe, Bellingham, Valverde after Real Madrid 3-1 Villarreal appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Transcript: Xabi Alonso’s Post-Match Press Conference After Real Madrid's Win Over Villarreal
arts.sum: Head coach Xabi Alonso spoke to the media after a win over third-place Villarreal, moving them to the top of the table with Barcelona to play tomorrow. Alonso: “He had a very good game and a decisive performance, not only because of the first goal but also because of the imbalance we were having with him.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid 3-1 Villarreal: Report & Full Match Highlights After Vinicius Jr. Brace Sinks the Yellow Submarine
arts.sum: Real Madrid head into the international break adding three more points to their La Liga total, beating Villarreal 3-1 at the Santiago Bernabeu. The goals all came in the second half, with Vinicius Jr. scoring a brace, and Kylian Mbappe continuing his hot form in front of goal.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid survive scare to secure crucial three points against 10-man Villarreal
arts.sum: Real Madrid survive several scares to secure a 3-1 victory over 10-man Villarreal on Saturday night, courtesy of a Vincius Junior brace and Kylian Mbappe strike.
